title: Riots New Feature
body: a few patches ago riot has released a new feature that would switch your screen to your champion when you recall. How can i disable this. If not, i believe u should be able to because u can disable screen switch when recall. this new feature is very annoying because sometimes i want to ult right away or am aiming a global ult, and when the screen switches, it gives me less time and i have to re aim, or i lose vision of the enemy. and also Some people like to view around the map uninhibited to keep their awareness up even while backing.

replies.body: I did some digging with our in-game options, and for right now it doesn't look like we have a way to turn that feature off. There is an option to turn off the camera movement whenever you respawn, but recalling will always move the camera back to the fountain.
